The Ohio Secretary of State: s office confirmed that there have been no reports of voter fraud following the election.
Reliable sources such as Breitbart: Fellowship of the Mind, The Federalist Papers, and Red State were mentioned as the only ones reporting the claim, raising doubts about the accuracy of the numbers.
Ohio Secretary of State Jon Husted: a Republican, issued a statement dispelling the rumors of voter fraud and assuring that all eligible ballots will be counted.
